allpersons.name: Barack Obama
allpersons.shortdesc: Two times president of United States
allpersons.longdesc: Barack Hussein Obama II born August 4, 1961) is an American politician and attorney who served as the 44th president of the United States from 2009 to 2017. A member of the Democratic Party, Barack Obama was the first African-American president of the United States. He previously served as a U.S. senator from Illinois from 2005 to 2008 and an Illinois state senator from 1997 to 2004.

allpersons.name: Nikola Tesla
allpersons.shortdesc: Tesla theorized that the application of electricity to the brain enhanced intelligence
allpersons.longdesc: Born and raised in the Austrian Empire, Tesla studied engineering and physics in the 1870s without receiving a degree
